title: When taping the DJI Fly app it opens the splash screen then immediately closes.
content:
I've updated to Android 11 beta. I realize it's in beta, so there will be issues. I'm just trying to see if there is anything I can try to get this app to launch. I have tried the following.

Uninstall DJI Fly app.
Restart phone.
Install DJI Fly app.

Same results. App opens to splash screen then closes to the background, which if you tap it, it will just do the same thing.
